shortdesc.ph: Check whether the device supports the flash always on.

section.p: This method needs to be called after the camera is started (for example, by calling or realization).
section.note: In general, the app turns on the front camera by default, so if your front camera does not support the flash always on, using this method directly will return false. If you need to check whether the rear camera supports the flash always on, you need to use the switch camera first, and then use this method.

ul.li: : The device supports the flash always on.
: The device does not support the flash always on.
